TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ValidationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class ValidationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ValidationAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 充当所有验证特性的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all validation attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类强制进行验证，基于与数据表相关联的元数据。This class enforces validation, based on the metadata that is associated with the data table. 您可以重写此类，以创建自定义验证特性。You can override this class to create custom validation attributes.

exception.span: 在设置非本地化 属性错误消息的同时，本地化错误消息的 和 属性也被设置。

span.span: The and properties for localized error message are set at the same time that the non-localized property error message is set.

related.span: 如何： 自定义数据模型使用自定义属性中的数据字段验证

span.span: How to: Customize Data Field Validation in the Data Model Using Custom Attributes

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过计算获得错误消息字符串属性或通过评估和属性。The error message string is obtained by evaluating the property or by evaluating the and properties. 两种情况下是相互排斥的。The two cases are mutually exclusive. 如果你想要显示本地化的错误消息，则使用第二种情况。The second case is used if you want to display a localized error message.

summary.span: 基于发生错误的数据字段对错误消息应用格式设置。

span.span: Applies formatting to an error message, based on the data field where the error occurred.

returns.span: 带有格式的错误消息的实例。

span.span: An instance of the formatted error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过使用设置一条错误消息属性。This method formats an error message by using the property. 此方法将追加触发带有格式的错误消息的错误的数据字段的名称。This method appends the name of the data field that triggered the error to the formatted error message. 您可以自定义如何通过创建派生的类重写此方法设置的错误消息的格式。You can customize how the error message is formatted by creating a derived class that overrides this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用方法以确定是否该对象指定`value`参数才有效。This method calls the method to determine whether the object that is specified by the `value` parameter is valid. 如果方法将返回`false`，此方法调用方法以获取说明该问题的本地化的消息。If the method returns `false`, this method calls the method to get a localized message that states the problem. 它会引发异常。It then throws a exception.

span.span: Validation failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证对象或在其上的属性的值声明特性。This method validates the value of the object or property on which the attribute is declared. 它将调用方法，并传递`value`作为参数。It calls the method and passes `value` as a parameter. 如果验证失败，引发异常。If validation fails, a exception is thrown.
